channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: The Great Exodus: How many Indian students travelled abroad to study?
Fact-check: Will Income Tax officers have access to your social media accounts?
From Kolkata to Delhi, how Hindu man’s lynching in Bangladesh has fired up Indians
Tarique Rahman to return to Bangladesh after 17 years: Can Khaleda Zia’s son influence February elections?
‘Time to Kash out’: Why Kash Patel’s choice of new wheels has sparked a row
Largest, most powerful and nuclear-capable… How deadly will be the new Trump-class ships
How Gaza trap will make Munir realise the cost of American lunch
item.description: For Trump, the Gaza peace plan is key for his nomination for the Nobel award, and there is no way nations pressured to participate can back away. Pakistan, the only Muslim nuclear power, is expected to take the lead

item.title: How India-New Zealand free trade pact is a win-win prospect
item.description: From dairy and meat to IT and start-ups, opportunities abound and could help both countries reshape global supply chains

item.title: Dhaka’s dangerous drift towards Islamist anarchy: Why Bharat must prepare for a 3.5-front war
item.description: Today, as Bangladesh descends into chaos, Bharat must be prepared to adopt a maximalist position

item.title: Pakistan seems to be falling into Gaza trap: Risking public wrath for Trump’s plan
item.description: The ‘no free lunch’ dilemma highlights domestic risks for Gen Asim Munir: saying yes to Washington’s demands to send troops to Gaza could spark backlash from Islamist parties and destabilise Pakistan, while saying no could strain relations with the US

item.title: Bondi Beach attack signals alarming resurgence of Islamic State
item.description: ISIS may have resorted to enhancing online propaganda and carrying out inspired attacks without direct involvement

item.title: How India’s latest visa reforms are a pragmatic step
item.description: Amid US-China trade wars, India's decision to streamline visa rules for Chinese professionals is a lifeline for economic ambition
